author: Shiv Sahay Singh
text:
Describing the January 3 violence at Kaliachak in Malda district as “not a small incident”, Union Home Minister Rajnath Singh said here on Thursday that the truth behind it should come out.

Addressing a party rally at Ashoknagar in North 24 Parganas district, Mr. Singh assured the gathering that those behind the incident would be put behind bars.

“Malda incident is not a small incident, and I want to tell this State government and the Chief Minister that those who are behind this incident, they will have to be unmasked, unravelled. Just a few arrests will not suffice,” Mr. Singh said.

The Home Minister questioned why the State government was unaware of such a large gathering and why senior police officers were not present.
title: Malda violence not a small incident: Rajnath
